page.title: 13ATTITUDES OF ARBROATH FOLK 2
page.content: Most people were satisfied with the range and standard of local{ {entertainment},mostly pub entertainment.Some people said compared to the English towns there was not enough entertainment for the pensioners and youngsters alike.Some people said that there were not enough sport and leisure facilities in their area and this could be improved.Most people said they were happy with the range of{clubs}and facilities in the area.The point was made however that local clubs should advertise more widely in order to attract custom.When asked about local {services}most people again mentioned the new one way road system and said they would like it altered.Other points mentioned were the cleanliness of the beach,upgrading the infirmary,and car park rates made identical for each park.
